text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow

Item features:
14x14 fuzzy soft Emojicon pillow,pillow smells like strawberry
Ships from USA,this is not shipped from china..Faster Delivery
Guaranteed up to a year from purchase
All orders ship out in 48 hours! HIGHEST QUALITY.
Smells like strawberry
text.Response A: This item is a Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow. It has many features including 14x14 fuzzy soft Emojicon pillow, it smells like strawberry, it ships from USA, it is guaranteed for a year, and more. If you have any questions about this item, please contact the seller.
text.Response B: Who knew a pillow could be so funny? This 14x14 pillow is the perfect way to show off your sense of humor. This pillow smells like strawberry and is guaranteed up to a year from purchase. All orders ship out in 48 hours! This is not shipped from china. This is a higher quality pillow and shipped faster than other sellers.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

459.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow

Item features:
14x14 fuzzy soft Emojicon pillow,pillow smells like strawberry
Ships from USA,this is not shipped from china..Faster Delivery
Guaranteed up to a year from purchase
All orders ship out in 48 hours! HIGHEST QUALITY.
Smells like strawberry

Response A

This item is a Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow. It has many features including 14x14 fuzzy soft Emojicon pillow, it smells like strawberry, it ships from USA, it is guaranteed for a year, and more. If you have any questions about this item, please contact the seller.

Response B

Who knew a pillow could be so funny? This 14x14 pillow is the perfect way to show off your sense of humor. This pillow smells like strawberry and is guaranteed up to a year from purchase. All orders ship out in 48 hours! This is not shipped from china. This is a higher quality pillow and shipped faster than other sellers.
